## Linked Issues

Use one of these formats so GitHub auto-closes the Issue on merge.

- Closes #<issue-number>
- Fixes #<issue-number>

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows naming conventions
- [ ] Code changes are scoped to one logical task
- [ ] Labels added (example: `cypress`, `jmeter`, `sql`, `playwright`)
- [ ] Comments added where helpful
- [ ] No debugging code left behind (console.logs, unused code)
